scripts.build: bun run build:frontend && bun run build:backend
scripts.dev: concurrently "bun run dev:backend" "bun run dev:frontend" -n backend,frontend
scripts.local:ci: bun run check && bun run format
scripts.changelog: git log --pretty=format:'### %h: %s%n%b' | sed 's/Merge pull request #\([0-9]*\) from \([^\/]*\)\/\(.*\)/Merge pull request \1 from \2\/\3/g' | sed 's/Merge branch \(.*\)/\n## Merge branch \1\n/g' > temp_changelog.md && if [ ! -f "CHANGELOG.md" ]; then echo "# Changelog" > CHANGELOG.md; cat temp_changelog.md >> CHANGELOG.md; else echo "" >> CHANGELOG.md; cat temp_changelog.md >> CHANGELOG.md; fi && rm temp_changelog.md && echo "CHANGELOG.md file generated successfully!"
